author: unknown
message:
PR #30872: [DOC] operation_semantics.md update - element wise unary functions

Imported from GitHub PR https://github.com/openxla/xla/pull/30872

## Summary of Changes
- Creation of subsection "Optional Result Accuracy"
    - Removed all ops with `result_accuracy` argument from main sections
    - Moved all ops with `result_accuracy` argument into subsection
    - New table created for section
 - Main section table reformatted
 - Linked to reference material in rfsc

Documentation update

4a999a4ac87f698274e1f645c00c8cca634597e1 by Amelia Thurdekoos <athurdekoos@quansight.com>:

duplicating result accuracy function

Merging this change closes #30872

PiperOrigin-RevId: 802580842

files.patch: @@ -1464,6 +1464,60 @@ The function is applied to each element in the `operand` array, resulting in an array with the same shape. It is allowed for `operand` to be a scalar (0-dimensional). +### Optional Result Accuracy + +XlaBuilder supports these element-wise unary functions with the optional +`result_accuracy` argument: + +`Cbrt(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise cubic root operation `x -> +cbrt(x)`. + +`Cos(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise cosine `x -> cos(x)`. + +`Erf(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise error function `x -> erf(x)` +where + +$$\text{erf}(x) = \frac{2}{\sqrt{\pi}}\int_0^x e^{-t^2} \, dt$$. + +`Exp(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise natural exponential `x -> +e^x`. + +`Expm1(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise natural exponential minus +one `x -> e^x - 1`. + +`Log(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise natural logarithm `x -> +ln(x)`. + +`Log1p(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise shifted natural logarithm +`x -> ln(1+x)`. + +`Logistic(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise logistic function +computation `x -> logistic(x)`. + +`Rsqrt(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise reciprocal of square root +operation `x -> 1.0 / sqrt(x)`. + +`Sin(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise sine `x -> sin(x)`. + +`Sqrt(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise square root operation `x -> +sqrt(x)`. + +`Tan(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise tangent `x -> tan(x)`. + +`Tanh(operand, result_accuracy)` Element-wise hyperbolic tangent `x -> +tanh(x)`. + +| Arguments | Type | Semantics | +| ----------------- | ------------------------- | --------------------------- | +| `operand` | `XlaOp` | The operand to the function | +| `result_accuracy` | optional `ResultAccuracy` | The types of accuracy the | +: : : user can request for unary : +: : : ops with multiple : +: : : implementations : + +For more information on `result_accuracy` see +[Result Accuracy](https://github.com/openxla/stablehlo/blob/main/rfcs/20241015-result-accuracy.md) + ## Fft The XLA FFT operation implements the forward and inverse Fourier Transforms for
